name: Presentations Template
summary: A PRVX file is a presentation template created by Presentations, a slide show presentations program included in the SoftMaker Office suite. It contains an ordered list of one or more slides, which may include text, images, tables, animations, drawn objects, and other media. PRVX files are typically used for creating .PRD and .PRDX spreadsheets with the same formatting or data.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

images.caption: PRVX file open in SoftMaker Office Presentations 2018
